original: Ahlberg, Julius, fd. bankdirektör, Göteborg, f. 12/5/74 i Gbg av kamr. v. SJ Nils A. o. Anna Bagge. G. 08 m. Elisabeth Pegelow. Barn: Anna Eurenius f. 10, anst. i A-B Sv. Hand:-banken, Carl-Fredrik 11, arkit. SAR. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs real 93, FiHp Holmqvists hand:sk. 93. Anst. h. F. W. Hasselblad & Co. 93-95, elev v. telegr :v. 95, e. o. tj :man v. riksbankens avd:kont. i Gbg 96, ord. i första lönegr. 02, i andra lönegr. 14, kamr. v. kont. i Härnösand 15, dir. 15-21, dir. i Karlstad 21-39, rev. o. siffergransk. h. A-B J. A. Wettergren & Co. m. fl. bol. Led. av stadsfullm. o. fattigv:-styr. i Härnösand 19-21, ordf. i fattig-vistyr. i Karlstad 30-37, v. ordf. i styr. f. Karlstads System A-B 31-39, huv:-man o. rev. i Karlstads Sparbank 37-39. RVO.
translated: Ahlberg, Julius, former bank manager, Gothenburg, born May 12, 1874 in Gothenburg to SJ accountant Nils A. and Anna Bagge. Married in 1908 to Elisabeth Pegelow. Children: Anna Eurenius born in 1910, employed at Svenska Handelsbanken, Carl-Fredrik born in 1911, architect SAR. Studied at Gothenburg's Real School in 1893 and at Holmqvist's Handwriting school the same year. Employed at F. W. Hasselblad & Co. from 1893-1895, then as a telegraph trainee in 1895, temporary employee at Riksbanken's Gothenburg office in 1896, permanent employee in 1902, promoted to a higher position in 1914, accountant in Härnösand in 1915, director from 1915-1921, director in Karlstad from 1921-1939, auditor and financial inspector at J. A. Wettergren & Co. among others. Member of the city council and poor relief board in Härnösand from 1919-1921, chairman of the poor relief board in Karlstad from 1930-1937, deputy chairman of the board of Karlstads System AB from 1931-1939, and chairman and financial inspector at Karlstads Savings Bank from 1937-1939. RVO (Knight of the Order of Vasa).
